topic.title: The Questions and Answers DITA Topic

body.p:
Using the
File New file wizard dialog you can create a new DITA Questions and Answers topic.
This type of topic groups together multiple question/answer sections and can be used to create for example a frequently asked questions document.
Such topics are also used when producing WebHelp output from DITA content to provide direct answers when searching for specific questions in the Search field or to train chatbot content.
